channel.title: Need help getting on another server
channel.description: OK, I'm new and I'm not sure how things work... Can you all reccommend the best server to play on, like the most updated or what you think is best ? And, give me a sort of tutorial on how I would be able to use it, I'd really appreciate it, thanks!

item.title: Need help getting on another server
item.dc:creator: @ownedu1 ownedu1
item.description:
@ownedu1 wrote:

just find a no-ip server lots these days both have hamachis and no-ips

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting on another server

item.title: Need help getting on another server
item.dc:creator: @monkey_ii monkey ii
item.description:
@monkey_ii wrote:

Oh, ok, thanks mate
And, do I need any downloads to play on their servers. Like that Hamatchi, because I see people saying it a lot, but I didn’t need it to play on my own.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting on another server

item.title: Need help getting on another server
item.dc:creator: @ownedu1 ownedu1
item.description:
@ownedu1 wrote:

dont post this i understand your new some im going to tell you now we dont know what youd like or disliked on a server soo we cant tell you. but go in avertisment section find a server you like and on moparscape client go to the top it says file click it, it should say new port, new server. what ever they told you the port and server ip was put them in the right place

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting on another server
